faac.port.description: Port number for the FAAC WebSocket server

faac.typingDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before sending typing context to server

faac.maxDocumentLength.description: Maximum number of characters to send from the document

faac.cursorMarker.description: String to insert at cursor position when sending context

faac.promptPrefix.default: Complete the following code. The cursor is at the marked position:
faac.promptPrefix.description: Prefix text to send before the code context
faac.promptPrefix.markdownDescription: Prefix text to send before the code context. You can use multi-line text here.

faac.promptSuffix.default: Provide a relevant code completion for the cursor position:
faac.promptSuffix.description: Suffix text to send after the code context

faac.enableCursorMarker.description: Whether to insert cursor marker in sent text

faac.sendFullDocument.description: Send entire document regardless of max length setting

faac.contextLines.description: Number of lines to include around cursor when not sending full document

faac.previewTimeout.description: How long to show suggestions before hiding them (ms)

faac.autoStartServer.description: Automatically start the server when the extension activates

faac.enableDebugLogging.description: Enable verbose debug logging in extension output

faac.allowedFileExtensions.description: File extensions to enable FAAC for (* for all files)
